title: ЛАПТОП LENOVO LEGION SLIM 5 16AHP9 16" R7-8845HS/32GB DDR5/1TB/RTX 4070 8GB

features.Resolution: WQXGA (2560x1600), IPS 350nits Anti-glare, 100% sRGB, 165Hz, Dolby® Vision™, G-SYNC®, Free-Sync Premium, Low Blue Light
features.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4070 8GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2175MHz, TGP 140W
features.Audio: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
features.Speakers: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
features.USB-C Ports: 2x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with PD 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4, 1x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with DisplayPort™ 1.4
